Answer:
response:
You can use the following code to save the results into a text file.

\begin{code}
public static void saveResults(int[][] winningCombination, String letter) throws IOException {
    PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter("results.txt");
    writer.write(letter + " Won!");
    writer.close();
}
\end{code}
